citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
No records were available for review at the time of inspection. Each exhibitor shall allow APHIS officials to examine
records required to be kept by the Act and regulations in this part. Records are essential to documenting that the animals
are provided veterinary care and contingencies are planned for as well as acquisition and disposition.
Correct by 20 May 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
No records were available for review at the time of inspection. Each exhibitor shall allow APHIS officials to examine 
records required to be kept by the Act and regulations in this part. Records are essential to documenting that the animals 
are provided veterinary care and contingencies are planned for as well as acquisition and disposition. 
 
Correct by 20 May 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
